As part of National #SummerLearningWeek (@smartersummers), Canticos is proud to help Literacy in Community (LINC) celebrate the 10th annual "Reading on the Rails: On the Move" on Tuesday, July 16th, ğŸ“šğŸš† LINC families from eight distinct neighborhoods across the city, traveled on public transit and read their way to a common destination, One World Observatory (@oneworldnyc) for a panoramic view of New York City from 1,250â€™ in the sky. ğŸŒ†âœ¨ Thank you Literacy in Community (LINC) for inviting me to headline you Reading on the Rails event at the One World Observatory. There was lots of reading dancing and smiling with one of the best views in the world. Thank you Laura Walsh Emmanuel Novy Virginia Taddoni Karen Rogel for making us a part of the LINC family. Special thanks to Iovino Enterprises, LLC. For making this event possible! #ReadingontheRails, #SummerLearningWeek, #DiscoverSummer, #summerlearning WNYC Radio Encantos
